author: mdzol.com
title: Vialidad Nacional y la red TelePASE advirtieron sobre estafas virtuales
text:
Vialidad Nacional y la red TelePASE advirtieron sobre estafas virtuales
Así mismo, se reiterpó que ni Vialidad Nacional ni TelePASE solicitan información privada ni ofrecen beneficios exclusivos poniéndose en contacto directo con los usuarios de la red.
El incremento de [estafas virtuales ](https://www.mdzol.com/temas/estafas-virtuales-25044.html)y engaños a través de redes sociales ha llevado a [Vialidad Nacional](https://www.argentina.gob.ar/noticias/vialidad-nacional-y-empresas-concesionarias-de-la-red-telepase-advierten-la-ciudadania-por), junto con las empresas concesionarias que integran la red [TelePASE](https://www.mdzol.com/temas/telepase-59471.html), a poner en marcha una campaña que busca proteger los datos sensibles de los usuarios.
Cabe recordaar que el servicio de TelePASE no tiene costos de alta ni genera gastos de mantenimiento de cuenta. Además, las facturaciones se realizan de forma quincenal o mensual, permitiendo a los usuarios consultar el detalle de sus pasadas y facturas en el Centro de Autogestión de TelePASE para la mayoría de las concesionarias.
Es por eso que, mediante un comunicado, destacaron la importancia de verificar que los sitios web que se visitan tengan la sigla https:// antes de acceder, como medida preventiva contra posibles estafas viruales. Así mismo, se reiteró que ni Vialidad Nacional ni TelePASE solicitan información privada ni ofrecen beneficios exclusivos mediante contactos directos.
Los usuarios pueden solicitar su dispositivo TelePASE de manera segura ingresando a https://telepase.com.ar/. Para canalizar consultas, se encuentra disponible un chat en el margen inferior izquierdo del mencionado sitio.
En caso de dudas, los usuarios pueden contactar al Centro de Atención al Usuario de Vialidad Nacional, que actúa como autoridad de aplicación de la Red Vial Nacional concesionada, mediante las líneas: 0800-222-6272 o 0800-333-0073, o a través del correo electrónico atencionalusuario@vialidad.gob.ar.
También es fundamental proteger la información personal y mantenerse alerta ante posibles engaños.

author: ExpressDigest
title: Chris Hemsworth’s very surprising breakfast order as he stops by a local Gold Coast restaurant
text:
Chris Hemsworth shocked restaurant workers on the Gold Coast on Tuesday.
The Aussie actor, 40, dropped by local Chinese restaurant Wok Temptation for breakfast.
According to the Gold Coast Bulletin, the Hollywood superstar ordered a duck dish, fried rice and a side of crispy chicken for his morning meal.
The Carrara restaurant manager was so shocked to see the movie star he had to Google Hemsworth’s tattoo’s to confirm it was him.
‘I had to check online and see what his tattoos look like and confirmed it was really him,’ he said.
Chris Hemsworth shocked restaurant workers on the Gold Coast on Tuesday. The Aussie actor, 40, dropped by local Chinese restaurant Wok Temptation for breakfast
‘I was shaking, for me it was a once in a lifetime opportunity to see and to cook for Chris Hemsworth.’
Hemsworth dropped by with his father and happily posed for photos with workers.
The Thor actor sported a plain white T-shirt with camouflage board shorts.
He accessorised the look with a cap and pair of sunglasses .
It comes after the star recently stood behind Australian singer Sean Millis after he was abused online.
According to the Gold Coast Bulletin , the Hollywood superstar ordered a duck dish, fried rice and a side of crispy chicken for his morning meal
Millis, 22, who appeared on The Voice in 2023, has Hunter’s Syndrome, a rare disease that has altered his appearance and made him a target of bullying from trolls.
Taking to his social media on Tuesday, Millis responded to the haters with a video in which he said: ‘I see the hurtful comments but I just try to ignore it and focus on the positives, never give up, keep doing what you love.’
In response to Millis’ share, Hemsworth, 40, sent a lengthy message of support to the budding star.
‘Hey mate you are a champion, keep spreading the love and positive energy,’ the Thor star began.
The Carrara restaurant manager was so shocked to see the movie star he had to G oogle Hemsworth’s tattoo’s to confirm it was him
‘I was shaking, for me it was a once in a lifetime opportunity to see and to cook for Chris Hemsworth,’ the owner of the eatery said
‘Let me ask you this, how many of those people who throw hurtful comments your way have you ever met in person? I bet not many!
‘Because most of them hide under a rock or a blocked account with all the other cowards who are afraid to ever be vulnerable and put themselves out there because they’re afraid of being rejected themselves so they attack the world before it attacks them.
‘What a lonely existence that must be. Don’t even look at that rubbish mate, don’t even give them that satisfaction.’
Chris is pictured with his wife Elsa Pataky
‘The only comments you need to give value to are from people who love and support you brother and above all else your own opinion of yourself which I know from having spent time with you is one of value and gratitude.’
The Thor actor signed off his touching tribute to with some stirring words of support.
‘You my friend are one incredibly kind soul and I thank you for that, keep it up!’ he wrote.
***
Read more at DailyMail.co.uk

author: AFP
title: NATO airbase in Germany raises security level over 'potential threat'
text: A NATO airbase in western Germany said Thursday it had raised its security level over a "potential threat". "We raised the security level at NATO Airbase Geilenkirchen based on intelligence information indicating potential threat," the base said in a post on social media platform X. The announcement comes just over a week after a German military base was sealed off for several hours as authorities investigated suspected sabotage. The base in Cologne-Wahn was locked down after a hole was discovered in a fence near drinking water storage facilities. But test results eventually showed that the tap water was not contaminated, according to the German army. At the same time, NATO announced an attempted trespassing incident at the Geilenkirchen base. An individual attempted to enter the base but was stopped and sent away, a spokesman said. No link between the two incidents has been established. Germany -- a key ally of Kyiv -- has been on high alert for sabotage and attacks on military facilities in the country in the wake of Moscow's 2022 invasion of Ukraine. In April, investigators arrested two German-Russian men on suspicion of spying for Russia and planning attacks in Germany -- including on US army facilities -- to undermine military support for Ukraine. ilp-mca/cwl

author: Radio Okapi (Radio Okapi)
title: Sud-Kivu : plus de 50 familles sans abri et d’importants dégâts matériels lors des pluies diluviennes à Kamanyola
text: Une cinquantaine de familles sont restées sans abri au quartier Kambara à Kamanyola, dans territoire de Walungu (Sud-Kivu), à la suite des pluies torrentielles qui se sont abattues mardi 26 et mercredi 27 décembre dans la région. Des blessés graves et plusieurs dégâts matériels sont également enregistrés, alors que d’autres biens domestiques sont emportés par les eaux de pluie, indique la société civile. Le Gouvernement provincial a tenu un conseil de sécurité en urgence compte tenu de cette situation en ville et dans les territoires. Parmi des solutions envisagées, il y a l’appui aux victimes et le déguerpissement forcé des personnes sur ces sites impropres à la construction. En réaction à cette situation dramatique, le député national Olive Mudekereza demande aux autorités provinciales et aux futurs élus de faire de ce problème leur première préoccupation : « J’encourage que tous ceux qui seront élus prennent à cœur la cause du Sud-Kivu. Surtout l’aménagement et l’urbanisation des constructions anarchiques dans la ville de Bukavu. Nous ne devons pas continuer à compter des morts. J’espère que tous ceux qui seront élus dans la ville de Bukavu : Jeunes, vieux, nouveaux, anciens qu’ils prennent ce dossier en main et que le caucus du Sud-Kivu et les 32 du Sud-Kivu qui iront à Kinshasa prennent la province comme un bien commun » Le mercredi dernier, plus de 25 morts ont été enregistrés à la suite de fortes pluies dans plusieurs quartiers de la ville de Bukavu. Des habitations entières ont été emportées.
